entry.title: Your Bright Blue Eyes
entry.summary:
Author: frosty_the_hitman

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,240Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 47

Summary: "Sure. Do I know you?" Arthur replied easily.Merlin held out a hand for Arthur to shake. "I'm Merlin.""So I don't know you?" Merthur Spider-Man AU
